unnormalised: News just in! After decades of speculation, Shri Rakesh Kumar from Lucknow has finally decided what to do with his life. Sources close to Shri Kumar, who has been affectionately (or perhaps not so affectionately) called "Sharma ji ka beta" his entire adult life, confirmed that he will be… wait for it… opening a chai stall!
normalised: News just in! After decades of speculation, Shri Rakesh Kumar from Lucknow has finally decided what to do with his life. Sources close to Shri Kumar, who has been affectionately (or perhaps not so affectionately) called "Sharma ji ka beta" his entire adult life, confirmed that he will be… wait for it… opening a chai stall!

unnormalised: Yes, you heard it right. Forget about that MBA everyone kept pushing on him. Forget about being "Engr. Kumar" at Infosys. Shri Kumar, now formally known as "Chai Wala Rakesh" to his inner circle (and soon to be outer circle, given the delicious chai he supposedly brews), is trading spreadsheets for spices. Location scouting is underway, with rumours swirling around a prime spot near Hazratganj.

Shri Kumar, now formally known as "Chai Wala Rakesh" to his inner circle (and soon to be outer circle, given the delicious chai he supposedly brews), is trading spreadsheets for spices. unnormalised: Word on the street is that his banner will proudly proclaim: "Chai Wala Rakesh – Finally fulfilling his destiny, much to Sharma ji's bemusement." We at "Totally Reliable News" wish Chai Wala Rakesh all the best in his new venture. Maybe Mrs. Sharma will finally stop comparing everyone to him… or maybe not. Stay tuned for further updates!
